workflows.creator: 5fded9ad-cf9a-43e3-9b08-28bde8b87d6e
workflows.title: Create NS Contact from SF Contact
workflows.description: Creates a NetSuite Contact from a Salesforce Contact

netsuite-2.title: Find contact
netsuite-2.description: Run the SQL to get the subscription term

netsuite-5.title: Set Primary Contact
netsuite-5.description: Sets the contact as the Primary Contact for the related customer.

call-workflow-1.title: Sync SF contact to NS
call-workflow-1.description: Ensures the SF contact is synced to NS by calling the related sub-flow.

boolean-condition-7.title: Is Primary Contact?
boolean-condition-7.description: If the contact is a primary contact, the Primary Contact role must be set to the contact for the related customer.

callable-workflow-response-2.title: Returns existing NetSuite ID
callable-workflow-response-2.description: The SF contact already references an existing NS contact. Returns this NetSuite ID.

netsuite-4.title: Set Primary Contact
netsuite-4.description: Sets the contact as the Primary Contact for the related customer.

netsuite-3.title: Counts contact with given ID
netsuite-3.description: Checks if contact with the given NetSuite ID exists or not by counting the number of matching record, expecting 0 or 1.

raw.value: { "q": "SELECT count(*) count FROM contact WHERE id = {$.steps.salesforce-1.records[0].NetSuite_ID__c}" }

boolean-condition-6.title: Is Primary Contact?
boolean-condition-6.description: If the contact is a primary contact, the Primary Contact role must be set to the contact for the related customer.

boolean-condition-5.title: Does NS contact exist?
boolean-condition-5.description: The NS contact exists if there is a matching contact.

boolean-condition-4.title: Has NetSuite ID?
boolean-condition-4.description: The NS contact exists if there is a matching contact.

dependencies.name: Sync SF Contact To NS Contact
